properties.name: perfumes.images.dir
properties.description: Directory where perfume images are stored.

properties.name: notes.images.dir
properties.description: Directory where note images are stored.

properties.name: scentdb.logstash.host
properties.description: The hostname of the logstash docker container.

properties.name: scentdb.logstash.enabled
properties.description: The environment variable that defines if logstash is enabled in order to activate a logback appender to it.
